Package upei.project

Class Board

java.lang.Object
upei.project.Board
class Board extends Object
The board creates the platform where the player and the fences can interact with each other

      protected boolean isOver()

      Returns:
      true if the player reached the goal

    • updateBoard

      protected Board updateBoard(boolean placingFence, String sGoal, String[] data)
      Updates the players action of moving or placing the fence on the board
      Parameters:
      placingFence - the player is placing the fence or moving
      sGoal - the player movement input
      data - the fence placement input
      Returns:
      the updated board content

    • getSuccessfullUpdate

      protected boolean getSuccessfullUpdate()

    • isValid

      protected static boolean isValid(int[] goal, Board board)
      This method runs through all the scenerios of the players expected new position and checks if the move is valid
      Parameters:
      goal - the expected new position of the player
      board - the current state of the board
      Returns:
      true if the new position is valid for the player to move

    • fenceBlocksMove

      private static boolean fenceBlocksMove(Player p, int[] goal, ArrayList<Fence> fences)
      This method checks if any of the existing fences are blocking the player from advancing
      Parameters:
      p - the player
      goal - the player's expected new position
      fences - the list of the existing fences
      Returns:
      true if the fence blocks the player's new move

    • pDiagsOpp

      private static boolean pDiagsOpp(int[] goal, Board board)
      This method checks if the player can move diagonally when there is the opponent in front of the player and the fence behind the opponent
      Parameters:
      goal - player's new expected position
      board - the current state of the board
      Returns:
      true if the player can move diagonally under this condition

    • pJumpsOpp

      private static int pJumpsOpp(int[] goal, Board board)
      This method checks if opponent is infront of the direction of the player so that it can jump over it.
      Parameters:
      goal - player's new expected position
      board - the current state of the board
      Returns:
      0 for no, 1 for yes, -1 for double blocked by a wall

    • oppNeighbours

      private static int oppNeighbours(Board board)
      This method checks if the player has the opponent in front of it in horizontal or vertical direction
      Parameters:
      board - the current state of the board
      Returns:
      when no opponent close by:0, when opponent up direction:1, down direction:2, left direction:3, right direction:4

    • outOfBounds

      private static boolean outOfBounds(int[] coord)
      This method checks if the move is within the board and the move is within the player reserved spaces
      Parameters:
      coord - The player's new expected position
      Returns:
      true if the player's new position is out of the board

    • getGoal

      private int[] getGoal(String sGoal)
      This method processes the new expected position of the player into readable form for the board class to use
      Parameters:
      sGoal - the new position data that needs to be processed
      Returns:
      the processed new position data of the player
